Articles.Content: How do they work? Is there a certain way to connect them, or something? Try as I might, I can\'t get an engine to feed from an external tank.
They\'re intended for tank-to-tank use, and don\'t feed directly into engines. You need to have a tank above the engine - or any other side-mountable component, technically.
Oh, thanks. Reading that post, it turns out I was piping it the wrong way..
